text: Nicholas More Seymour (born 9 December 1958) is an Australian musician and record producer. He is known as the bass guitarist for the rock band Crowded House. His younger brother, Mark Seymour, is a singer-songwriter for the rock band Hunters & Collectors. title: Nick Seymour
